text:
Each vendor shall pay a daily fee of $45 per stall for each day on which he or she sells. A vendor who pays in advance for an entire month shall receive a 10 percent discount on the total charge for that month. 
(Added by Ord. 287-98, App. 9/18/98; amended by Ord. 277-99, File No. 991546, App. 10/29/99; Ord. 131-03, File No. 030625, App. 5/30/2003)
